Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Rashomon
Description: Brimming with action while incisively examining the nature of truth and the complexities of human nature; four people recount different versions of the story of a man’s murder and the rape of this wife.

Genre.Name: Drama / Mystery
Genre.Description: Drama / Mystery film, revolves around the solution of a problem or a crime focusing on the resolution of mysterious circumstances of an issue.

Director.Name: Akira Kurosawa
Director.Bio: Akira Kurosawa was a Japanese film director and screenwriter regarded as one of the most important and influential filmmakers in the history of cinema.

Title: Tokyo Story
Description: Brimming with action while incisively examining the nature of truth and the complexities of human nature; four people recount different versions of the story of a man’s murder and the rape of this wife.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama, revolves around serious presentations or stories with settings or life situations that portray characters in conflict with either themselves, others, or forces of nature.

Director.Name: Yasujiro Ozu
Director.Bio: Yasujiro Ozu was a Japanese film director and screenwriter.

Title: Godzilla (Gojira)
Description: Brimming with action while incisively examining the nature of truth and the complexities of human nature; four people recount different versions of the story of a man’s murder and the rape of this wife.

Genre.Name: Tokusatsu (Special Filming) Protest Movie
Genre.Description: Protest film, revolves around visually speaking out against all forms of rights violations ranging from the natural world to human rights.

Director.Name: Ishiro Honda
Director.Bio: Ishiro Honda was a Japanese film director and screenwriter.

Bio: Ishiro Honda was a Japanese film director and screenwriter. Honda is best known for work in the Godzilla franchise but earlier in his career he worked extensively in the documentary and war genres.

Title: Paths of Glory
Description: A transcendentally humane war movie with impressive, protracted battle scenes and a knock-out ending.

Genre.Name: Anti-War
Genre.Description: Anti-War film, revolves around the futility of war.

Director.Name: Stanley Kubrick
Director.Bio: Stanley Kubrick was an American film director, screenwriter, and producer frequently cited as one of the most influential filmmakers in cinematic history.

Title: Spartacus
Description: Inspired by the life story of Spartacus who led a slave revolt and a formidable legion of escaped gladiators during the Third Servile War.

Genre.Name: Epic Historical Drama
Genre.Description: Epic Historical Drama film, revolves around a long and complicated story about important historical empires, events or worlds often involving spectacular settings in China, Egypt, Greece or Rome.

Director.Name: Stanley Kubrick
Director.Bio: Stanley Kubrick was an American film director, screenwriter, and producer frequently cited as one of the most influential filmmakers in cinematic history.

Bio: Stanley Kubrick was an American film director, screenwriter, and producer who while taking on controversial stories and topics is still frequently cited as one of the most influential filmmakers in cinematic history.

Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Description: An imposing black structure provides a connection between the past and the future as a team of astronauts sent on a mysterious mission deal with the increasingly strange behavior of their ship’s computer system leading up to a tense showdown between man and machine.

Genre.Name: Epic Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Epic Science Fiction film, revolves around imaginative and futuristic concepts such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), advanced science and technology, space exploration, time travel, parallel universes, and extraterrestrial life.

Director.Name: Stanley Kubrick
Director.Bio: Stanley Kubrick was an American film director, screenwriter, and producer frequently cited as one of the most influential filmmakers in cinematic history.

Title: Chinatown
Description: A private eye hired to investigate what he initially believes is a routine case winds up on a tangled trail of corruption, deceit and sinister family secrets.

Genre.Name: Neo-noir Mystery
Genre.Description: Neo-noir Mystery film, is a revival of film noir, i.e., a dark movie, indicating something sinister and/or shadowy.

Director.Name: Roman Polanski
Director.Bio: Roman Polanski is a French-Polish film director, producer, writer, and actor.

Title: Gallipoli
Description: Set during World War I, several young, naïve Australians join the army and lose their innocence about the purpose of war.

Genre.Name: War Drama
Genre.Description: War Drama film, has been strongly associated with the 20th century as it revolves around warfare with battle scenes central to the drama.

Director.Name: Peter Weir
Director.Bio: Peter Lindsey Weir, AM is an Australian film director.

Title: Bound
Description: An affair between the girlfriend of a violent gangster and a woman recently released from prison evolves into a plan to steal two million dollars of the mob’s money as part of escaping the relationship with the gangster.

Genre.Name: Neo-noir Crime Thriller
Genre.Description: Neo-noir Crime Thriller, is a revival of film noir often revolving around crime, suspense with twisted dark wit.

Director.Name: The Wachowskis, Lana and Lilly
Director.Bio: Collectively known as the Wachowskis, Lana and Lilly Wachowski are American film and television directors, writers and producers.

Title: Ronin
Description: A team of assembled experts finds redemption by stealing a valuable briefcase of which the contents are unknown.

Genre.Name: Action Thriller
Genre.Description: Action Thriller film, uses physical action to create suspense revolving around continuous motion, battles, chases and plot twists.

Director.Name: John Frankenheimer
Director.Bio: John Frankenheimer was an American film and television director.
